episodes.title: The Draw of Destiny
episodes.plot: On the continent of Marquet, strangers traveling in the capital city of Jrusar, are thrown together in battle and are thereafter approached about working together for a mysterious benefactor.

episodes.title: Trial by Firelight
episodes.plot: The three groups of adventurers slowly begin to form a cohesive unit as a tentative alliance is forged with the vigilant and mysterious Lord Eshteross.

episodes.title: The Trail and the Toll
episodes.plot: While investigating a series of thefts at the behest of their potential patron, the group stumbles onto something much more dangerous than they anticipated, with lasting consequences.

episodes.title: On the Trail of a Killer
episodes.plot: As a night of victory turns into tragedy, our heroes must awaken to deal with the aftermath and danger that now lingers in the shadows.

episodes.title: The Threat Between the Walls
episodes.plot: Our heroes are hot on the trail of a murderer when their path leads them into the heart of a terribly dangerous situation.

episodes.title: Growing Bonds and Teasing Threads
episodes.plot: Our heroes gather in the afterglow of a successful mission for vengeance, seeking to know more about each other, and the many mysteries that permeate the streets of Jrusar.

episodes.title: Behind the Curtain
episodes.plot: Our heroes pursue a mystery that leads them to enjoy a night at the theater - but who knows where their investigation shall take them, and what dangers may lie in wait?

episodes.title: A Woodworker's Quandary
episodes.plot: Our heroes, now coming off the rush of a mystery solved, now look to learn about this mysterious new figure who's wandered in their path, and where this may take them.

episodes.title: Thicker Grows the Meal and Plot
episodes.plot: The group continues their search for Chetney's missing friend, even as their discoveries yield stranger and stranger reports about the man they're looking for.

episodes.title: Ghosts, Dates, and Darker Fates
episodes.plot: Seeking the missing wild man, our heroes fall deeper into the conspiracy, leading to a tense burglary interrupted - and there's still a date to get to.

episodes.title: Chasing Nightmares
episodes.plot: The group comes face to face with the terrifying entity known as the Nightmare King but the interaction leaves only questions to an increasingly perplexing puzzle.

episodes.title: Make It Fashion
episodes.plot: The group readies themselves for the ball while beginning to piece together a cryptic puzzle of criss-crossing threads of fate.

episodes.title: A Dance of Deception
episodes.plot: With a heist somewhat planned, the group attends the masquerade ball but have trouble keeping a low profile as various complications arise.

episodes.title: In Too Deep
episodes.plot: As the Quorum's Ball grows ever more chaotic, the complications continue to mount in the face of our heroes, and familiar darkness rears its ugly head

episodes.title: The Tunnels Below
episodes.plot: Following the antics that ended the Ball with a friend's departure, our heroes grapple with merging mysteries and unwanted attention.

episodes.title: The Shade Mother
episodes.plot: Making a temporary alliance, our heroes delve into the tunnels deep within the Smolder Spire to seek their quarry, finding more than they bargained for.

episodes.title: Heart-to-Heartmoor
episodes.plot: In the aftermath of the escape from the Shade Mother, Bells Hells prepares for their next journey chasing the mysteries that flicker beyond the horizon.

episodes.title: A Hungry Jungle
episodes.plot: While traveling to the Heartmoor Hamlet, Bells Hells find their night's rest interrupted by an enormous fey plant creature intent on devouring them whole.

episodes.title: Omens Above
episodes.plot: Newly arrived in the Heartmoor Hamlet, Bells Hells seek answers to long-sought questions and prepare for the midnight museum heist.

episodes.title: Breaking and Entering...
episodes.plot: Steeped in mysteries and pulling the threads attached, our heroes rush into the dangers of the Twilight Mirror Museum to burgle within.

episodes.title: Fight at the Museum
episodes.plot: Deep in the twisting halls of the Twilight Mirror Museum, our heroes skulk battered and bruised as their quarry stares them down in the heart of danger.

episodes.title: Promise and Potential
episodes.plot: Returned from their Heartmoor caper, our heroes seek to close some threads while the promise of new adventures and mysteries grows.

episodes.title: To the Skies
episodes.plot: Bells Hells finish their business in Jrusar and take to the skies on The Silver Sun skyship, where wonders and dangers lurk among the clouds.

episodes.title: The Hellcatch Valley
episodes.plot: Gliding over the dangerous landscape of the Hellcatch Valley, Bells Hells head for their destination of Bassuras, and whatever threats may await them there.

episodes.title: A Taste of Tal'Dorei
episodes.plot: We return to the rough-and-tumble streets of Bassaras and the terrifying promise of what lies within the Taste of Tal'dorei.

episodes.title: Hidden Truths
episodes.plot: Bells Hells seek out allies and options in their evolving plan to infiltrate Paragon's Call.

episodes.title: A Race for the Prize
episodes.plot: Bells Hells tend to their inner relationships before returning to the Seat of Disdain, but a surprising face in Paragon's Call rattles several members of the group.

episodes.title: The Deathwish Run
episodes.plot: Tension builds at the base of the Bone Tree as dangerous automatons and their mad dog drivers growl in anticipation of the Deathwish Run.

episodes.title: Dark Portents
episodes.plot: Following the crazed Deathwish Run, a Mother-Daughter reunion is interrupted by an insidious deception revealed.

episodes.title: Reunion & Revelation
episodes.plot: Bells Hells finds themselves entangled in dangerous Fey business as they ride across the Hellcatch for more answers to a growing mystery and looming danger.

episodes.title: Breaking Point
episodes.plot: Hot on the trail of moon-based mysteries, Bells Hells tangles with dark truths, familial fallout, and ominous portents.

episodes.title: A Stage Set
episodes.plot: Bells Hells tinker with former friendships and robotic inner workings before returning to Paragon's Call, this time as newly minted members.

episodes.title: Blood and Dust
episodes.plot: Surrounded by chaos, Bells Hells act quickly to secure their quarry, but their attempted escape leads to an unexpected confrontation with a deadly foe.

episodes.title: What Dreams May Come
episodes.plot: As the scales of fate shifted towards darker consequences at the hand of Otohan, Bells Hells faces the outcome of the deadly battle

episodes.title: Pyrrhic Return
episodes.plot: As the echoes of tragedy ripple on, Bells Hells push ever onward to make good on lingering promises, and hold onto hope.

episodes.title: A Desperate Call
episodes.plot: Bells Hells magically arrive in the city of Whitestone and meet a few legendary heroes in their search to save Laudna, but discover that her soul is not so easily retrieved.

episodes.title: From the Boughs
episodes.plot: Bells Hells traverse a dark and corrupted Whitestone and face twisted traumatic shadows of the past in their effort to save Laudna's soul.

episodes.title: A Dark Balance
episodes.plot: Our heroes have battled through a shadow realm to save the soul of a friend - and now return to Whitestone with hope in their eyes.

episodes.title: The Momentum of Murder
episodes.plot: Bells Hells must contend with the bureaucracy of being murder suspects before they can begin their turbulent travels to southern Marquet.

episodes.title: Compulsions
episodes.plot: Bells Hells reflect upon the latest and strangest moon developments as they near the Gloomed Jungles and prepare for a potential rendezvous with the Gorgynei lycans.

episodes.title: Call of the Wild
episodes.plot: Bells Hells travel deep into the Gloomed Jungles with the Gorgynei to seek a godly trial that may help Chetney's plight.

episodes.title: The City of Flowing Light
episodes.plot: With the completion of Chetney's unique trial, Bells Hells heads towards the city of Yios and the promise of answers.

episodes.title: Axiom Shaken
episodes.plot: Bells Hells seek out answers about the stolen texts from members of the Grim Verity, but the knowledge revealed could change everything they know about the gods of Exandria.

episodes.title: Bawdy Basement Belligerence
episodes.plot: Trapped in the basement of a fugitive, Bells Hells turn to chaos in an effort to escape their hunters and learn more about who leads their adversaries.

episodes.title: Ominous Lectures
episodes.plot: Bells Hells return to the Aydinlan Seminary to speak with two professors about the mysteries affecting their friends, but an unexpected guest complicates everything.

episodes.title: Night at the Ligament Manor
episodes.plot: Leaving Yios to leap into the Fey Realm after an important target, Bells Hells finds themselves meeting with Fearne's curious Nana Morri and learn more about Fearne's unconventional upbringing.

episodes.title: The Fey Key
episodes.plot: Bells Hells carefully traverse the shadowy side of the Fey Realm and dodge numerous dangers in their attempt to destroy the first Malleus Key.

episodes.title: An Exit Most Fraught
episodes.plot: With one victory achieved, the mounting threats rise exponentially, and the race for a theoretical exit starts now.

episodes.title: The Aurora Grows
episodes.plot: Having escaped from their planar journey and recovered their ride, Bells Hells sets skysail as the coming Apogee Solstice rapidly approaches.

episodes.title: Red Moon Rising
episodes.plot: With the apogee solstice imminent, Bells Hells begin their infiltration of the Tishtan ruins, where they encounter new faces in the fight against the Ruby Vanguard.

episodes.title: The Apogee Solstice
episodes.plot: Bells Hells race against time and lifelong plotting as they attempt to stop the Ruby Vanguard from releasing the god-eater Predathos and potentially dooming the world.

episodes.title: Far From The Others
episodes.plot: In the wake of the Apogee Solstice and the culmination of an ancient mage's machinations, Bells Hells finds itself divided and cast across Exandria, one side within the North of Wildemount.

episodes.title: Ripples
episodes.plot: Team Wildemount has acquired new allies with older ties, and heads towards Uthodurn while dealing with the aftermath of bestial violence

episodes.title: Treacherous Toys
episodes.plot: With the changes across Exandria mounting in the wake of the Moon of Ill Omen, our heroes seek information while avoiding some tumultuous history.

episodes.title: Hope Within History
episodes.plot: Having delved into some of Chetney's past, one half of the scattered crew seeks info on the threats that loom, and the means of returning to their found family.

episodes.title: By Goat or By Boat
episodes.plot: Goat-mounted and driven, our heroes trek towards the dark, corrupted depths of the Savalirwood in hopes of finding hidden answers about the past.

episodes.title: The Sorrow of Molaesmyr
episodes.plot: Having arrived in the fabled, corrupted heart of the Savalirwood, our heroes search the ruins of Molaesmyr in hopes of learning more about Ludinus and his nature.

episodes.title: Escape From The Past
episodes.plot: Assailed by the deadly denizens of Molaesmyr, our heroes seek to grab what they seek and survive to flee the corrupted grounds.

episodes.title: Somewhere Out There
episodes.plot: Orym, Ashton, and Laudna find themselves in an unfamiliar land, meeting unfamiliar people, as they attempt to piece together why they were separated from their friends and where exactly they are in the world.

episodes.title: Faith or Famine
episodes.plot: Team Issylra makes their way towards civilization, where a small town's troubles with an overbearing temple offers a new perspective on how helpful the gods can be.

episodes.title: Crisis of Faith
episodes.plot: Caught between the brimming tensions of community and imposed faith, our heroes are pulled into the conflict's breaking point.

episodes.title: Guest Battle Royal: The Plunder Games
episodes.plot: Five warriors are plucked from Exandria's timeline and forced to fight in an alternate reality TV show - Garyon Garrington's Plunder Games. The last contestant standing will be awarded one use of the Wish spell.

episodes.title: Elden Ring: O Ye of Little Faith
episodes.plot: GM Matthew Mercer leads a group of the Tarnished comprised of our very own Marisha Ray and Sam Riegel, as well as special guests Krystina Arielle, Brennan Lee Mulligan, and Alexander Ward through the Lands Between.

episodes.title: Tiny Tina's Wonderlands One-Shot
episodes.plot: Bunker Master Ashly Burch guides players Laura Bailey, Ashley Johnson, Travis Willingham, Robbie Daymond, and Ify Nwadiwe through a Bunkers and Badasses one-shot, inspired by Tiny Tina's Wonderlands.

episodes.title: Dignity: An Adventure with Stephen Colbert and Critical Role to Benefit Red Nose Day
episodes.plot: Game Master Matthew Mercer guides an adventure shaped by your donations to CRF's Red Nose Day fundraiser. Players Ashley Johnson, Marisha Ray, and Sam Riegel reprise Level 5 versions of their Mighty Nein characters (Yasha, Beau, and Nott respectively), alongside the one and only Stephen Colbert.

episodes.title: A Familiar Problem: Sprinkle's Incredible Journey
episodes.plot: Marisha Ray takes the RPG A Familiar Problem to Exandria with a chaotic crew of scrappy, stressed-out animal pals on an adventure. This one-shot features Critical Role's own Laura Bailey, Matthew Mercer, and Travis Willingham with special guests Heidi N Closet (RuPaul's Drag Race) and Isabella Roland (Dimension 20).

episodes.title: San Diego Comic-Con 2022 - Critical Role Q&A Panel
episodes.plot: After almost three long years...we finally reunited with the Critters at San Diego Comic Con.

episodes.title: Generation Nord
episodes.plot: "Players Laura Bailey, Aimee Carrero, Christian Navarro, Liam O'Brien, and Lou Wilson, are led by game master and sponsorship legend... Sam Riegel on a journey through the information superhighway (aka the internet). PLUS we'll unveil a special guest that you won't want to miss!"

episodes.title: The Mighty Nein Reunited Part 1: Unfinished Business
episodes.plot: Picking up several months after the events in Cognouza, our unsung heroes have all started new chapters in their lives. However, when some discover that there are still old chapters yet to be closed, The Mighty Nein must reunite for more stories untold.

episodes.title: The Mighty Nein Reunited Part 2: Uk'otoa Unleashed
episodes.plot: Picking up several months after the events in Cognouza, our unsung heroes have all started new chapters in their lives. However, when some discover that there are still old chapters yet to be closed, The Mighty Nein must reunite for more stories untold.

episodes.title: Legend of Zelda One-Shot: Lookout, Here We Come!
episodes.plot: Join the voice of Ganondorf himself, Matthew Mercer, as he leads Emily Axford, Omar Najam, Robbie Daymond, Liam O'Brien and Marisha Ray on a wild adventure through Hyrule.
